alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 12:56PM MST until February 04 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills of minus 5 to minus 10. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico, the Guadalupe and Davis Mountains, and portions of the Permian Basin. * WHEN...From 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening to 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Also minimize time outdoors.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County
